records.text: Draft agenda for today's #Wikibase user group meeting at 15:00 UTC (16:00 London, 17:00 Berlin, 11:00 US Eastern): https://etherpad.wikimedia.org/p/WBUG_2024_06_27This week we'll be discussing the Wikimedia #MovementCharter and try to decide whether to ratify it. It's a surprise here, too; we'll just have to see!
